title: The Nutty Salty Bar with Yummi Nuts
ingredients: Packages of all Yummi Nuts products
instructions: Step 1: Create a candy station type based on Yummi Nuts. Some served in jars, others in paper cones, others in small containers.
Step 2: It is complemented with bottles that do not say what they have inside, glasses and glasses.
Step 3: We could incorporate Yummies Snacks if they allow it.
